price: Sag: Allah errettet euch davon und von jeder Trübsal, hierauf gesellt ihr (Ihm) dennoch (andere Götter) bei.
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُنَجِّيكُم مِّنۡهَا وَمِن كُلِّ كَرۡبٖ ثُمَّ أَنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: quli al-lahu yunajjīkum min'hā wamin kulli karbin thumma antum tush'rikūna
